translations: adj．使人丧失人性的，使人变得不像人的：使人失去尊严、自尊或人性的特质。
· The dehumanizing effects of war can be seen in the soldiers' behavior.
战争使人丧失人性的影响可以从士兵的行为中看出。

sentences.sentence: No one can stand this mind-numbing and dehumanizing work.
sentences.translation: 没有人能够忍受这种麻木的非人般的工作。

sentences.sentence: When work is toil — the opposite of play — it can be dehumanizing.
sentences.translation: 而当工作是辛苦的、是玩耍的反面时，它就可能是不人道的。

sentences.sentence: When applied to people it often has a dehumanizing effect and negates both individual differences and unique talents.
sentences.translation: 当它被用于人时，通常是会起到抹杀个体特征和特殊天赋的去人性化效果。
